document.full_text: scientists confirmed on thursday that they have discovered oil on dead dolphins found along the u.s. gulf coast, raising fresh concerns about the effects of last year's bp oil spill on sea life.
document.title: scientists link oil on dolphins to bp spill
lines_and_colors: scientists confirmed on thursday that they have discovered oil on dead dolphins found along the u.s. gulf coast, raising fresh concerns about the effects of last year's bp oil spill on sea life.
